channel.title: [COMBINED THREAD] Homestuck FM - New Session - Town and PM wins!
channel.description:
# Homestuck Forum Mafia: Beyond the Fourth Wall
Hosted by @clonedcheese
Reviewed by @sulit
Looking for co-hosts and/or VC bots *** # [Read Homestuck here](http://homestuck.com) # Now If you don't wanna read there's a dubbed version linked below
![04286|500x500](upload://iv7iCtmL5yq8O5xKy11sIBEby8p.gif) *There are still a few characters I haven't killed yet. I almost forgot about them.* ***
## Gameplay:
This is a closed setup, i.e. there is no rolelist or classcard list. You will each receive a class card in dms with unique abilities and flavour.
The mafia will communicate in a private message on the forums.
Days night cycles are 48/24.
The execution is majority and EoD plurality.
Although claiming is not explicitly banned, there will be mechanics that will disadvantage those that do. Flavor is almost strictly AI, and anti-town characters will be given a fakeclaim.
There may or may not be conversion in the game.
There may or may not be tailoring and/or framing effects in this game.
There are at least 2 factions in the game. Those two factions are listed in the example class cards below.
There may or may not be dead interaction in this game. Dead players may choose to become a VC bot.
Your class card, the OP, host announcements and player flips will not lie to you on purpose.
## Example Class Cards:
This is the general format of all class cards:
[details="Example town"] > # Andrew Hussie > > > > **Town Storyteller** >![Hussiescribble|180x125](upload://9kLxCaPOz4Idm2NVoN2N9rbUFGb.gif) > > > *The host of the game.* > **Creator of Homestuck (Passive)** - If you are executed, you will leak information about the town. > **Modkill (Day)** - If target player posts in the wrong thread, you will modkill them, bypassing everything. Not usuable starting D3. [Infinite Uses] > **Log Night Actions (Night)** - Target a player, you will add their night action to the spreadsheet. [Infinite Uses] > *Goal: Defeat the Mafia while getting the game to be not canned.*
[/details]
[details="Example Mafia"] > # E-boy Hussie > > > > **Mafia Storyteller** >![Hussie|139x185](upload://eqi3eSOF7Eu3bhBhmCDnqwulIZp.jpeg) > > > *The host of the game.* > **Creator of Homestuck (Passive)** - If you are executed, you will leak information about the mafia. > **Modkill (Day)** - If target player posts in the wrong thread, you will modkill them, bypassing everything. Not usuable starting D3. [Infinite Uses] > **Log Night Actions (Night)** - Target a player, you will add their night action to the spreadsheet. [Infinite Uses] > *Goal: Overpower the Town while getting the game to be not canned.* [/details]
## 2 Threads!
Day 1 and Day 2 will be carried out in 2 separate threads. You may only speak and act to people within your own thread. **Speaking in the other thread at any point will result in a modkill.** It is allowed to speak about the other thread, but you may never post in them. Imagine each thread as a spectator chat for the other. There may or may not be roles that can influence the other thread - this will be explicitly listed in your rolecard.
## Strife!
ITA’s are present in this game and are called “strife”s. To strife against a player, simply type **/strife [player]** during any time in the day, and ping the hosts. There is a base chance of 15% to kill the target, but be careful! There is also a 5% chance, independent of whether you kill or not, that you will die.
## Rules:
Follow the global forum rules.
Don’t discuss this game outside of host-sanctioned threads/private messages.
Please be respectful to all players.
Don’t weaponise the host.
Please do not use big text, it is reserved for the host.
Do not edit or delete posts. Quickedits for grammar, typos, and/or readability will be allowed, but any edit of content will be modkilled.
Do not quote host private messages.
Do not gamethrow. This includes anything that goes against your stated win condition.
If you do not post for 36 hours, you will be prodded for inactivity. If you do not respond within a further 12 hours, you will be forced to replace out.
Any activity tells or discussing of alts will receive newspaper to head :angry:
## Executions:
To accuse a player, bold your message and type **/vote [player]** or **/accuse [player]**, and ping the hosts. **Any vote that do not ping the hosts will be void.**
Should majority be reached on a player, they will be executed and the day finishes early.
Should no majority be reached, plurality will take effect and the player with the most votes at the end of the day will be executed, ending the day. In the case of a tie, no executions will occur.
In this game, there is no option for a “No Execution” starting day 3. Instead, to not eliminate any players in the game, you may vote to execute the host. If the host is executed through a plurality vote at the end of the day, information about members of the host’s alignment will appear in the main thread. If the host is hammered by a majority, this information will be given only to the hammerer in their rolecard. The host’s alignment will be randomized with probability equal to that of the composition of the game at the start of each day.
## Logs:
There are no logs in this game, although cat pics would be nice :P
## Feedback List:
Feedback is kept to a minimum.
## Rolelist:
[details="Rolelist!!!!!1!1!!"] [Super Secret!!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ) [/details]
## Alts: Go wild lmao Designated moderator is @DatBird
## Other Notes:
If every player wishes the skip the night, the night will be skipped. Type /skip night or something in your rolecard.
<small>also this is the host's first ever setup be nice might be stupid throughout game thank</small>
## Player List:
Thread 1:
1. Mist1422
3. Appelsiini
5. PokemonKidRyan
6. Simon
Thread 2:
5. KyoDaz
9. fourfourfourfour
# Graveyard:
1. Centuries - Killed N2
2. An_gorta_pratai - Killed N2
3. Ash4fun - killed N2
4. mathmods - Killed N1
6. Leafia - Yeeted D1
7. Modeshifter - killed D1
8. Zone_Q11 - Yeeted D2
10. oB_L1ght - Killed D2
7. ~~Geyde~~ marshal Killed N2
8. Apprentice - Left D2
4. Wazza - Yeeted D1
6. Hammerman - killed D3
## Backups:
1. Marshal 2. Chloe 3. TheBlueElixir
## Specs:
1. Jane (Uninformed) 3. Icibalus (Informed) 4. Sulit (Informed) 5. Astand 6. Italy (Informed) 7. Amelia (Informed)
## Useful links: [Voting for Event 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/thread-1-homestuck-fm-the-battleship-year-1-8-8/82700/418?u=clonedcheese) [EoD1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/thread-1-homestuck-fm-the-battleship-year-1-8-8/82700/857?u=clonedcheese)
## Resources:
1. Homestuck Dubbing (most of it): [large playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLHO1rc05qiGtAidSBy_8jsEOlHXR6x4cd) 2. Homestuck Recaps, for the first half: [Recap 1](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bqudt_gJuAs) [Recap 2](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zsA0ODBaTTc) [Recap 3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jDXZQmLKct0) 3. Homestuck Wiki: https://mspaintadventures.fandom.com/wiki/Homestuck

item.title: [COMBINED THREAD] Homestuck FM - New Session - Town and PM wins!
item.dc:creator: Zone_Q11
item.description:
clonedcheese:

rolecard confusion, especially with Kyo’s card (redirections visit apparently)

“The Monochrome will remember…”

clonedcheese:

My design philosophy for this game was “how much can I get away with”
Hence the infinite bus driver, lynchcop, and guiltless vig

Welp. Congrats. You made it “somewhat reaching Lying Darkness territory”.

clonedcheese:

Plz rate:

  1. Host’s hosting skills (VCs, conduct, etc)
  2. Balance (roles)
  3. Mechanics
  1. The VCs and general interaction is fine.
  2. Unbalanced as ****. To the point where I am questioning whether sulit even looked at it.
  3. “Could have been fun” were it not for the swingy as **** roles. Resurrection on N2 however was DEFINITELY NOT a good plan unless you made all deaths flipless beforehand. (But that would require you to notify the players about it beforehand.)

Read full topic

item.source: [COMBINED THREAD] Homestuck FM - New Session - Town and PM wins!

item.title: [COMBINED THREAD] Homestuck FM - New Session - Town and PM wins!
item.dc:creator: ash4fun
item.description:
1. Hosting skillz:

couple of preventable mistakes but I think you reacted to them pretty well. Maybe next time have someone ask ~3 questions on each ability or smth, really try to nail those down.

  1. Balance:

Homestuck Balance1350×629 61.6 KB

  1. Mechanics:

I’m sure the (insanely) high power has something to do with it, but I thought a lot of the stuff was pretty creative. The two-thread gimmick was pretty fun, although it might have done better in a larger game. Tbh I was going to play it as two minis–I like that.

You were definitely right to nerf my ability with the “ties don’t count” thing I think, probably could have used a little bit more polish there

Read full topic
item.source: [COMBINED THREAD] Homestuck FM - New Session - Town and PM wins!

item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
I’m lazy so I’m not going to actually do the image edit

image500×649 97 KB

first dude: ‘town keeps losing to powerful unannounced NKs’

suggester one: ‘put in a role specifically with the goal of getting them executed!’

suggester two: ‘make their abilities super underpowered!’

third suggester: ‘what if we don’t have an NK?’

Read full topic
